high_descs: Turn to the left and move to the bat.
Pick up the bat from the corner
Bring the bat to the lamp on the table.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp on the table.

high_descs: Turn left and walk towards the bat on the floor.
Pick up the bat from the floor.
Turn around, walk towards the bed, and turn left towards the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a bat by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn left and walk towards the baseball bat on the floor.
Pick up the baseball bat from the floor.
Turn right and walk toward the table lamp at the other end of the room.
anns.task_desc: Examine a baseball bat by the light of a table lamp.
